name: Rocs-Hardcore-Nauvis
title: Hard Nauvis
author: thesixthroc
description: Difficulty tweaks to Nauvis. Nights are darker, some ore patches are mixed, projectiles can miss, efficiency modules are 30% weaker, flamethrowers and locomotives use more fuel, and shotguns are stronger. There are many optional dependencies to customize enemies and other aspects of Nauvis. Vanilla+.
